feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add function to get filename of workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/233

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.18.0...v1.18.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Only keep the basename when storing the filename by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/235
  • feat: Accept API query parameters for workout import by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/237
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/241
  • fix: update default workout types when editing equipment by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/243
  • feat: add Indonesian language by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/245
  • fix: use English plural form by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/246
  • fix: actually fix the English translation now by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/247
  • fix: add prettier and air dependencies by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/248
  • Add route segments by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/234
  • chore(deps): bump micromatch from 4.0.7 to 4.0.8 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/249
  • Split dependency installation in dev vs build by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/253
  • Remove a single translation that is almost identical by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/255
  • Show tempo for running (speed for others) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/254
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/244
  • Feature/batch matching by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/262
  • fix: do not show zero heart rate in chart by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/263
  • feat: add golangci-lint configuration by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/264
  • Remove location from dashboard tiles, cosmetic improvements by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/258
  • feat: Add donation section to README by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/265
  • feat: add prettier configuration by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/266
  • feat: Add calorie calculation and display by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/268
  • feat: add Persian language support by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/269
  • feat: Add translation strings for calorie burn estimation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/270
  • fix: error saving route segment after matching by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/272
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/271
  • feat: Add map full screen toggle and aerial map option by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/274
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/275
  • fix: place closing div of map in the right spot by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/276
  • feat: Add Matrix chat badge by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/279
  • docs: Add a link to the Matrix chatroom by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/281
  • feat: Delay expensive workout actions to background routine by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/282
  • chore: Move the route handlers to their own files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/283
  • add dependabot to take care of dependency update by @Monirzadeh in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/285
  • chore(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 5 to 6 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/287
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 6 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/288
  • fix: wrong usage of Param for swagger by @Monirzadeh in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/289
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/290
  • add golangci-lint by @Monirzadeh in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/284
  • use map for icons by @Monirzadeh in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/291
  • fix: show min/mi value instead of min/km when using imperial units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/295
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/296
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/292
  • feat: add workout sharing functionality by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/286
  • feat: Show elevation of route segment instead of speed by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/297
  • Switch icon library from fontawesome to iconify by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/299
  • feat: add support for e-cycling by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/300
  • feat: Add Russian translation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/301
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/303
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/302
  • Fix Russian translation file by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/304
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/305
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/306
  • fix: Use default file name "workout.gpx" by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/309
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/310
  • Add postgres docker-compose file by @woernsn in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/308
  • fix(importer): Remove Filename field reset by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/311
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/312
  • chore(deps): bump the all group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/319
  • feat(middleware): Validate user on all endpoints by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/323
  • Dispatch all data functions used in the views by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/324
  • Fix database constraints and improve data matching by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/326
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/325
  • feat(database): Add pre-migration cleanup actions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/327
  • Style(css): Remove unused material icons link by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/328
  • feat(app): Add workout filtering and sorting by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/331
  • chore(deps): update github.com/galeone/tcx by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/340
  • chore(deps): bump the all group across 1 directory with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/333
  • chore(deps): bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/337
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/339
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/332
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.27.0 to 0.31.0 in the go_modules group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/336
  • Fix the user lookup function for API calls by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/341
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/342
  • Add profile option to switch app theme by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/343
  • Fix struct alignment by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/344
  • Fix timezone issues in workout statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/345
  • Parse and show workout timezone by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/346
  • feat(filter): Improved filter UI by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/347
  • chore(fit): Switch to different library for Garmin FIT by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/348
  • feat(style): Add cursor pointer style and apply to filter summary by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/349
  • Add heat map of workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/350
  • Draw all coordinates individually by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/351
  • A bundle of fixes by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/352
  • Add markers per workout to the heatmap by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/353
  • Style(css): Update notice colors by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/354
  • A number of fixes by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/355
  • Switch html/template to templ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/357
  • Further cleanup after switch to templ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/359
  • chore(deps): bump the all group across 1 directory with 6 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/358
  • Fix workouts display at time 0 by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/361
  • Add tests for the API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/360
  • Update the swagger API docs by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/362
  • Fix some more linting issues by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/363
  • Remove html/template from markdown conversion by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/364
  • Improve filters by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/365
  • Fix the missing tailwind class generation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/366
  • Switch i18n library to ctxi18n by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/367
  • Remove untranslated language files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/369
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/368
  • Replace github.com/vorlif/spreak with github.com/sersh88/timeago by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/370
  • More cleanups after templ + i18n switch by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/371
  • Add all remaining missing translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/372
  • Add more missing translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/374
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/373
  • Fix a few more template errors by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/375
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/376
  • refactor: Improve error handling in equipment handlers by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/377

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/249
  • @Monirzadeh made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/285
  • @woernsn made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/308

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.18.1...v2.0.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add back a number of icons that went missing by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/378
  • Bump templates generated by templ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/379
  • Convert the pages into a shared template by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/381
  • Improve the page options for scripts and stylesheets by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/382
  • fix(user): Set context of user from request by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/384
  • Always show workout details in lists by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/385

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor(template): Remove duplicate footer from statistics page by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/386
  • Refactor(views): Improve workout and route segment name display by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/389
  • refactor(converters): Improve name detection by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/390
  • Fix(gpx): Handle GPX files without track names by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/391
  • Upgrade go.mod to v2 by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/393
  • Implement simple query caching by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/394

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update readme by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/395
  • Add resources for route segments by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/396
  • Add route segment tests by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/397
  • Finnish translations by @tphakala in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/398
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/400
  • Refactor(build): Rename binary and restructure project by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/403
  • feat(database): Improve statistics query by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/404
  • Add a debugger tool by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/405
  • Add generic diagnose command by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/407

New Contributors

  • @tphakala made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/398

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3
